song_lyrics: Chāre kore sakhā shobhatā, vachche chhabīlo Shyām... ° 1
Ḍanlop sāheb āviyā, kāne suṇī Bhagwān;
Baḷī Rājānī rītyu shu, arapyu bhūminu dān... ° 2
Prabhu pātra pote malyā, Sahajānand sujāṇ;
Sūrya Chandranī sākhye, arpī bhūmi paramāṇ... ° 3
Āshīrvād āpī karī, dīdho abhevar ām;
Karuṇāsāgare kṛupā karī, dīdho abhevar sār;
Dās Gopāḷ kahe ṭāḷiyā, Jampurīnā mār... ° 5
title: Beṭhā sihāsan upare Sahajānand sukhdhām

metadata.kirtan_info:
2-252: Gopaldas

Category: Amdavad Shrihari Leela Pad
